@anyNode said:

By popular request: the double double.** Vegas KVM - 4GB Ram, 60GB SSD, 2x Shared vCPU Cores**, 6TB BW, 1 IPv4, /48 IPv6, Free DA License - $30/year - Order Here

I just realized that there's an option for monthly billing in the order form; is the free DA license available for the monthly option? Will I be able to convert the payment scheme to annual later on?

Sorry I missed your question here.

The plans are annual billing only - I believe you might be referring to the pricing field where it averages the annual price out to monthly.

In any case - the free DA license is available on any of our 1GB+ ram plans.
